text: Nǐmen de qīzi hǎobǐ nǐmen de tiándì, suǒyǐ, nǐmen hé shí yuànyì, nǐmen biàn kě jìnrù nǐmen de tiándì. Nǐmen dāng tíqián wéi zìjǐ zuò shànshì [rú fángshìqián qiú zhǔ cìyǔ qiánchéng shànliáng de érnǚ děng]. Nǐmen dāng jìngwèi ān lā. Nǐmen dāng zhīdào, nǐmen [zài hòushì] bì yǔ tā xiāng huì. Nǐ [mù shèng] dāng xiàng xìnshìmen bàoxǐ.
